parameter.name: qd.root.element
parameter.desc: This is a required parameter that tells QuillDriver what the root element of its data files must be. For example, in this case, it must be 'TEXT'.

parameter.name: qd.mediaurl
parameter.desc: This is a required parameter that tells QuillDriver where to find the audio or video file associated with this XML annotation. Its value is an XPATH expression which is based at the root of the XML tree.

parameter.name: qd.timealignednodes
parameter.desc: Without this parameter, QuillDriver will not know how to find out which nodes are 'associated' with time codes and which are not. The value of this parameter is an XPATH expression which returns all XML nodes that are associated with time codes, again searching from the root of the XML tree.

parameter.name: qd.nodebegins
parameter.desc: The parameter qd.timealignednodes returns the set of XML nodes associated with time codes. Once this set is established, then we still need to know how get the start and end time for an associated node. This parameter is an XPATH expression which locates the start time for a XML node associated with time codes.

parameter.name: qd.nodeends
parameter.desc: The parameter qd.timealignednodes returns the set of XML nodes associated with time codes. Once this set is established, then we still need to know how get the start and end time for an associated node. This parameter is an XPATH expression which locates the end time for a XML node associated with time codes.

parameter.name: qd.nearestplayableparent
parameter.desc: For any given node, this required parameter locates the nearest 'playable' parent node. When you click on a node in the annotation the default action is to play the nearest playable parent node. For example, if time codes are associated with Divisions and you click on a Note, then setting this parameter correctly ensures that its containing Division is played.

navigation.name: Play/Pause
navigation.desc: If the media is stopped, this plays it; and if the media is playing, this pauses it.

navigation.name: Next Playable
navigation.desc: This navigation is used to play the next part of the log that has time codes associated with it. First, the next playable node is located. Then, it is played because this viewing function is associated with the QuillDriver command 'playNode'.

navigation.name: Current Playable
navigation.desc: This navigation is used to play the current part of the log that has time codes associated with it, for example, the current sentence. First, the current node is located. Then, it is played because this viewing function is associated with the QuillDriver command 'playNode'.

navigation.name: Previous Playable
navigation.desc: This navigation is used to play the last part of the log that has time codes associated with it. First, the next playable node is located. Then, it is played because this viewing function is associated with the QuillDriver command 'playNode'.

navigation.name: Next Sentence
navigation.desc: Jumps to the next sentence, without playing it.

navigation.name: Previous Sentence
navigation.desc: Jumps to the previous sentence, without playing it.

transformation.name: Fix Media
transformation.desc: Takes the currently open media file or URL and copies it into the transcript.

transformation.name: Mark Start Time
transformation.desc: This assigns the start time of the current sentence to the start time in the time coding window.

transformation.name: Mark Stop Time
transformation.desc: This assigns the stop time of the current sentence to the stop time in the time coding window.

transformation.name: Mark Start and Stop
transformation.desc: This editing function is used to copy the time codes found under the video next to the 'Start' and 'Stop' buttons into your XML file. They will be copied to the current node you are working on. For example, if you are typing or translating text, they will be assigned to the current 'S' (Sentence) node.

transformation.name: Increase Start Time
transformation.desc: Increases the start time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Rapid Increase Start
transformation.desc: Increases the start time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Decrease Start Time
transformation.desc: Decreases the start time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Rapid Decrease Start
transformation.desc: Decreases the start time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Increase Stop Time
transformation.desc: Increases the stop time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Rapid Increase Stop
transformation.desc: Increases the stop time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Decrease Stop Time
transformation.desc: Decreases the stop time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Rapid Decrease Stop
transformation.desc: Decreases the stop time of the current sentence by a specified value.

transformation.name: Append Division
transformation.desc: This function appends a Division as the last child of the current Division.

transformation.name: Insert Division After
transformation.desc: This function inserts a blank Division after the current Division.

transformation.name: Insert Division Before
transformation.desc: This function inserts a blank Division before the current Division.

transformation.name: Delete Division
transformation.desc: Use this to delete the current Division.

transformation.name: Surround with Page-Line Breaks
transformation.desc: Inserts a page-line milestone marker break.

transformation.name: Remove Page-Line Break
transformation.desc: Removes page-line break.

transformation.name: Add Lexical Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add a lexical note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Add Grammatical Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add a grammatical note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Add Pronunciation Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add a pronunciation note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Add Interpretive Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add an interpretive note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Add Sociolinguistic Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add a sociolinguistic note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Add Cultural Note
transformation.desc: Use this to add a cultural note to the end of the current Division.

transformation.name: Delete Note
transformation.desc: Use this to delete the current note.

tag.name: DESC
tag.desc: This tells QuillDriver to display the DESC tag as 'Description', and to display its contents.

tag.name: NOTE
tag.desc: This tells QuillDriver to render the NOTE tag as the value of its 'type' attribute.

tag.name: AUDIO
tag.desc: This tells QuillDriver to not render the AUDIO tag at all. We do not render this tag since time codes are already marked under the video in the time coding area.
